contest-event.event-date: Jan. 28, 1973 D Durham League Contest (Section C) Durham League Contest (Section C) 30 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-c The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) Little Suite for Brass [Arnold] Spennymoor Town Hall, Spennymoor, County Durham, England, UK Prizes - 1st £18 and cup, 2nd £10 and rose bowl, 3rd £5. 12 bands competed.
